Reviews.Title: “Lovely Hotel!”
Reviews.Author: kathy H
Reviews.Content: loved comfortable boutique hotel don´t stay inclusive hotel hotel romantic service hotel las stayed 5 nights enjoyed beach club playa mamitas stayed 3 hours 3 days hotel closed 5th ave playa del carmen perfect sized clean nice decor petty gardens nice pool deck shorter nice hotel course recommend

Reviews.Content: terrific attractive comfortable clean service price easy parking couple spots outside usually free relaxing indoor pool free internet lobby cool quiet it’s bit farther beach 67 blocks playa walking anyway
